messages.subject: Awesome Unschooling Speakers, Events and Fun at the next UWG!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Wondering what spectacular gift to give your kids and family for Christmas? Let them know you’re going to the ….   4th Annual UNSCHOOLERS WATERPARK
messages.messageBody:
Wondering what spectacular gift to give your kids and family for Christmas?
Let them know you’re going to the ….
 
4th Annual
UNSCHOOLERS WATERPARK GATHERING
Kalahari Indoor Waterpark Resort - Sandusky, Ohio
May 15 - 20, 2011
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/
 

Keynote Opening Speaker – Pat Farenga along with a top FEATURED SPEAKER EACH EVENING, plus lots of other great unschooling speakers!
Lots of Funshops for kids and adults of ALL ages
Several New Awesome Events:


Mentoring  Match-ups

Sunday Evening Meet & Greet Pool Party

Family Speed Dating
Mom's Night Out
Karaoke Night
Off-Site Fields Trips - Cedar Pt., Lake Erie Ferry Cruises,  Museums,  NASA tours & more!
Other Events Back by Popular Demand

Carnival  - w/ games, face painting, stage acts & even a Dunking Tank!
Talent Show
Movie Night
SSUDS Gatherings –Secret Society of Unschooling Dads
Kid's Market Place
Grand Ballroom Dance
On-going Kid's Craft and Playroom 
On-going Older Kids Lounge and Gaming Room
Thrilling Waterpark Rides and Coasters, Wavepools, hot-tubs and more... 
New this year - Use of their Outdoor Waterpark and Adventure Complex!
Super Discounted Room Rates -  Rooms starting at only $85 / night (includes 4 waterpark passes) (other room types are available)
 
For further information and to register,  please join our UWG yahoo group at: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/
 
You truly won't want to miss this awesome gathering of thousands of unschoolers from around the USA and other countries!
 
Happy Holidays and hope to see you at the 4th Annual Unschoolers'  Waterpark Gathering, May 15 - 20, 2011!
 
~ Carol Reinhard
UWG Coordinator
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/%c2%a0%c2%a0
 
Please help us spread the word!  Please forward this to all your unschoolly groups and friends.  THANKS!

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
